Message 236 of 4024
Donâ€™t mischaracterize what I just said. Please take a moment and read it again.
Sent:01/04/2024 at 06:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/04/2024 at 07:26 PM)
Subject:Re: Confirming Events
Message 237 of 4024
Please stop texting me. It is not an emergency.
Stating you are not getting a response to OFW in 1.5 hours for non emergency items as reason to text me, is unreasonable. Interactions with you,
especially in person or over the phone are contentious so I have asked to stop and move to this platform.
Sent:01/04/2024 at 07:30 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/04/2024 at 07:58 PM)
Subject:Re: Confirming Events
Message 238 of 4024
Happy Birthday
Plans for today as I understand.
You will pick up Adrian and Dylan after school.
Dylan to be dropped off at his house.
Adrian to spend the day/evening with you.
TBD if Adrian spends the night.
Ski ride program emailed me yesterday and thought they could accommodate the switch to Sunday but wanted more details on his age etc. If they
confirm today, plan is for Adrian to spend the night and I pick up at 9am on Saturday.
If I do not receive a confirmation on the switch, I will pick up Adrian at 8:30pm tonight so he can attend ski lesson Saturday am.
Sent:01/05/2024 at 07:24 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/05/2024 at 07:24 AM)
Subject:Adrian today
Message 239 of 4024
Ski lesson confirmed moved to Sunday.
I will plan on Adrian spending the night with you and pick up at 9am tomorrow unless you let me know otherwise.
Sent:01/05/2024 at 07:54 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/05/2024 at 07:54 AM)
Subject:Re: Adrian today
